apps.name: PersonalAI
apps.description: Comprehensive local AI assistant with chat, image/video generation, song writing, and 20+ automation skills. Serves as the base backend for AssistantAI ecosystem.
apps.installScript: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend

apps.name: MVP Assistant
apps.description: MVP Assistant - dynamically generates custom GUI applications to solve user problems. Sister app to PersonalAI in the AssistantAI ecosystem.
